roleset.name: move with wiping action

example.name: with intensifier
example.text: [It]-1 also has removed a ban on CIA use of a contingency fund for covert acts and has agreed *trace*-1 to wipe away some tortured and legalistic restrictions on coup planning put in place to ensure that the CIA didn't get back in the assassination game.
example.arg: some tortured and legalistic restrictions on coup planning put in place to ensure that the CIA didn't get back in the assassination game.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG2 and ARG3
example.text: I immediately squatted down , and then they beat me on the face and head , I do n't know who it was ; I wiped my face with my hand , my hand was full of blood , they had broken open my mouth . "

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: And God will wipe away every tear from their eyes . ''

roleset.note: WIPE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls funnel-9.3-2, wipe_manner-10.4.1-1. (from wipe.01-v)

example.name: active
example.text: When you do that you wipe out the criminal incentives, including, I might say, the incentive that the drug pushers have to go around and get kids addicted, so that they create a market for themselves.
example.arg: the criminal incentives, including, I might say, the incentive that the drug pushers have to go around and get kids addicted, so that they create a market for themselves.

example.name: more commonly passive
example.text: [The vast majority of them]-1, however, were wiped *trace*-1 out by a succession of environmental upheavals that were too sudden and catastrophic for the normal rules of natural selection to operate.
example.arg: by a succession of environmental upheavals that were too sudden and catastrophic for the normal rules of natural selection to operate.

example.name: all args
example.text: After I've thoroughly wiped her out with a four mile evening walk, and satisfied her back-in-the-apartment yen to have her belly rubbed, she -- right before collapsing for the night -- vigorously bats and rubs at her muzzle with both front paws.
example.arg: with a four mile evening walk,

roleset.name: wipe off: remove impurities from a surface

example.name: both args
example.text: He did n't even bother [*]to wipe himself off and he chopped part of Pa 's door down before he stopped .

example.name: passive
example.text: The bodies must be cleaned and seats wiped [*]off '' .

roleset.note: WIPE_OFF-V NOTES: Oddly, the impurities don't seem to be mentionable. (from wipe.03-v)

roleset.name: wipe up: remove via wiping action

example.name: just wiper and dirt
example.text: And then you wiped up some grease '' .

example.name: ARG2 and ARG3
example.text: that's the same Reagan who wiped up the floor with Jimmy Carter in the debate in 1980.
